string.text: the item in your rucksack is 'slightly' irradiated
the item in your rucksack is irradiated
the item in your rucksack is 'heavily' irradiated
the item was thrown out due to the impossibility of further use
It is not known who manages to bake sticks on the territory of the Zone, or how they are dragged across the border.\n • Weak Radiation Contamination.

Often, for want of anything better, this sausage-a mixture of chicken and soy substitute-becomes breakfast, lunch and a stalker dinner. Thanks to a large number of preservatives does not spoil for quite some time.\n • Weak Radiation Contamination.
Presumably, canned food from the stalked army food warehouse; it is not possible to establish precisely what is possible due to the absence of any label.\n • Weak Radiation Contamination.

the main component is an artificially created steroid, similar in chemical composition to testosterone. It is used by stalkers in long transitions to increase the fatigue threshold of muscles. Helps to significantly increase the tolerable weight. the drug is long-acting.\n • Weak Radiation Contamination.

It is often used by stalkers in multi-day hikes, when No possibility to stop and rest. Contains easily digestible carbohydrates, as well as drugs that cause the release of adrenaline into the blood.\n • Weak Radiation Contamination.
